attributes.action: Staffordshire University to reinstate The Suyuti Institute with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details:
This is due to no wrong of their own but as a result of hate mail, which has reached prominent heads at the University through various mediums; concocted by a handful of perpetrators with an islamaphobic and hate agenda.  There is no truth to these allegations.  

The Institute, its members and community are now suffering and are the victims of harassment and defamation. 

We therefore request that Staffordshire University reinstate The Suyuti Institute with their position at the University.
attributes.background: As a result of a number of unqualified allegations, Staffordshire University have dismissed The Suyuti Institute from teaching at their leek road campus with immediate effect.
